sourcesContent:
import { Container, Row, Col, ProgressBar, Button } from 'react-bootstrap' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import history from '../history' function Home() { let user = useSelector((state) => state.user) let games = useSelector((state) => state.games) useEffect(() => { let enemyProgress = document.querySelectorAll(".progress-bar")[0] let userProgress = document.querySelectorAll(".progress-bar")[1] let gamesWon = games.map(game => game.game_won ? game : null).length let gamesLost = (games.length) - gamesWon enemyProgress.style.height = `${gamesLost * 10}%` userProgress.style.height = `${gamesWon * 10}%` }) const handleClick = () => { history.push('/game') } return (

Hello {user.username}



 ) } export default Home;
